Key Match Events: Justyn-Henry Malloy's eighth-inning sacrifice fly helped the Detroit Tigers rally from a 3-0 deficit to move closer to the postseason with a 4-3 win over the Tampa Bay Rays
Miscellaneous Highlights: This was the third game in the current series between the Detroit Tigers and Tampa Bay Rays, with the Tigers leading 3-0
Others: The game took 2 hours and 23 minutes to complete
